channel.title: Updates & News on MRinRT Symposium 2025
channel.description: Recent content in Updates & News on MRinRT Symposium 2025

item.title: Registration is Now Open
item.description:
Registration for the 12th MRI in RT symposium is now open.
Registration closes: April 30, 2026

Registration

item.title: Call for Abstracts
item.description:
We invite you to submit your original contributions in the field of MR simulation and MR-guided radiotherapy to the 12th MR in RT symposium, which will take place on June 17-19th, 2026 at Odense Concert Hall - Comwell H.C. Andersen in Odense, Denmark.

Important Dates

  • Abstract Submission Opens: November 18, 2025
  • Abstract Submission Deadline: January 22, 2026
  • Anticipated Notification Date: Mid March, 2026

Abstract Information
